content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I am glad you are interested in my apartment. I am sure you will find it quite appealing. Let's start with a price of 1000 Euros per month. Remember, I am willing to go higher if you are willing to pay more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's too expensive for me. I am a student and I am looking for something more affordable.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand that. But remember, the location of the apartment is very central. It is close to all important facilities. Let's try 900 Euros per month. This is a great price for such a prime location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think that's still too much. I can find something more affordable.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Consider the fact that the apartment is newly built and unfurnished. This means you can decorate it according to your taste. Let's try 850 Euros per month. This is a steal for such a great place.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's still too much for me. I can find something cheaper.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: But you must remember that the apartment is in the city center. This means you will have easy access to all amenities. Let's try 800 Euros per month. This is the lowest I can go for such a prime location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [800] Euro!
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of [800] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
